title: Brunson and Christian History in Anatolia
text:
Regarding Adam O’Neal’s “The Weekend Interview with Andrew Brunson: Turkey’s American Hostage Speaks Out” (Oct. 5): Andrew Brunson, the unjustly imprisoned Evangelical Presbyterian Church missionary, says, “We went to Turkey because it was the largest unevangelized country in the world.” But in the earliest days of Christianity, what is now Turkey was probably the most evangelized country in the world. Muslim persecution of Christians is the reason for the change.
